headline: Trump Says 200% Pharma Tariffs Are Coming. Wall Street Shrugs.
summary: A generous grace period would give drugmakers time to sidestep most of the pain of looming duties.

raw.headline: Trump Says 200% Pharma Tariffs Are Coming. Wall Street Shrugs.
raw.summary: A generous grace period would give drugmakers time to sidestep most of the pain of looming duties.

headline: Why Novartis Is Still A 'Buy' After 15% Surge
summary: Novartis shares climb on strong Cosentyx sales, franchise growth, and a new malaria drug approval despite political risks. Find out why NVS stock is a buy.

raw.headline: Why Novartis Is Still A 'Buy' After 15% Surge
